articles.content: A vaccine produced in a bioreactor goes under further processing in a sterile laminar flow cabinet. The photo is from the National Virus Vector Laboratory at the A.I. Virtanen Institute for Molecular… [+3562 chars]

articles.author: Mike Stobbe, AP Medical Writer
articles.title: CDC COVID vaccine guidelines: Fully vaccinated people can gather without masks, Centers for Disease Control says - KTRK-TV
articles.description: As the COVID-19 vaccine rolls out nationwide, fully vaccinated Americans can gather with other vaccinated people indoors without wearing a mask or social distancing, according to long-awaited guidance from federal health officials.
articles.content: NEW YORK -- Fully vaccinated Americans can gather with other vaccinated people indoors without wearing a mask or social distancing, according to long-awaited guidance from federal health officials.Th… [+6025 chars]
